tooltips.assignmentPermission:
Allows to restrict an ability to assign records and post messages to other users.

all - no restriction

team - can assign and post only to teammates

no - can assign and post only to self
tooltips.portalPermission: Defines an access to portal information, ability to post messages to portal users.
tooltips.dataPrivacyPermission: Allows to view and erase personal data.

messages.changesAfterClearCache: All changes in an access control will be applied after cache is cleared.
